item.title: Right click duel
item.dc:creator: @nacnac nacnac
item.description:
@nacnac wrote:

I added and got this

Shot at 2007-07-14

}if(InDuelArena) { outStream.createFrameVarSize(104); outStream.writeByteC(2); // command slot (does it matter which one?) outStream.writeByteA(0); // 0 or 1; 0 if command should be placed on top in context menu outStream.writeString("Duel With"); outStream.endFrameVarSize(); } else { outStream.createFrameVarSize(104); outStream.writeByteC(1); // command slot (does it matter which one?) outStream.writeByteA(0); // 0 or 1; 0 if command should be placed on top in context menu outStream.writeString("Trade with"); outStream.endFrameVarSize(); } public boolean inDuelArena() { if((absX >=3333 && absX <=3357 && absY >=3248 && absY <=3254 ) || heightLevel == 1) return true; else return false; } } } }
